amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow for 120 days after the final environmental impact statement or no later than January 1, 2012, for the President to issue a final decision on the Keystone XL pipeline.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-181 to extend the deadline for permit decision to 120 days after final environmental impact statement or until January 1, 2012.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 265 (Roll no. 645).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 265 (Roll no. 645).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Rush.
